data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Janice: Do you know how I can get to Roger's Island?
Tanya: I ____! You're ____ to ____ to ____ north ____ about ____ hour, and ____ you'll ____ to ____ the ____ across ____ river.
Janice: Where ____ I ____ the ____ ticket?
Tanya: They'll charge you once you're on board.
data.partBlankContent:
Janice: Do you know how I can get to Roger's Island?
Tanya: I d_! You're go___ to ha__ to dr___ north f__ about a_ hour, and th__ you'll ha__ to ta__ the fe___ across t__ river.
Janice: Where d_ I b__ the fe___ ticket?

data.fullContent: Janice: Do you know how I can get to Roger's Island? Tanya: I do! You're going to have to drive north for about an hour, and then you'll have to take the ferry across the river. Janice: Where do I buy the ferry ticket? Tanya: They'll charge you once you're on board.
data.answer: Janice:你知道我怎么去罗杰的岛吗? Tanya:我知道!你得往北开大约一个小时，然后你必须乘渡船过河。 Janice:我在哪里买船票? Tanya:你上船后他们就会收费的。
